title: Magic Face T1
summary: Magic Face T1 is highly customized watch face. Inside all options you can change
description: Features:Highly customized options including:✔ Theme colors✔ Compass✔ Weather icon✔ Temperature (Fahrenheit and Celsius)✔ clock hands✔ battery level✔ Step counter ✔ DayMagic Face T1 is absolutely fantastic Android face we have ever created. This stunning watch face is inspired by super car dashboard, futuristic, professional,and unique. A Heap of customized options for you to select.Supported devices: All Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.As we understand what you expect from next top watch face, so this time Magic team works really hard to bring innovation into the next level.Please rate us positive if you like our work. Attention:1:Compass could cost more battery than other features.2:For some reasons, compass could be stalled.We recommend you to re-start the app to try again..Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.comSeeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately. Tips:✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).2. Uninstall the face.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the face and select “resync apps”in settingsAttention:- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.Contact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Web:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchfaceAnd more coming ways to find us:Instagram, Pinterest... descriptionHTML:
Features:
Highly customized options including:
✔ Theme colors
✔ Compass
✔ Weather icon
✔ Temperature (Fahrenheit and Celsius)
✔ clock hands
✔ battery level
✔ Step counter
✔ Day

Magic Face T1 is absolutely fantastic Android face we have ever created. This stunning watch face is inspired by super car dashboard, futuristic, professional,and unique. A Heap of customized options for you to select.

Supported devices:
All Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

As we understand what you expect from next top watch face, so this time Magic team works really hard to bring innovation into the next level.

Please rate us positive if you like our work.


Attention:
1:Compass could cost more battery than other features.
2:For some reasons, compass could be stalled.We recommend you to re-start the app to try again..

Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.


Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:

- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.


Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

And more coming ways to find us:

Thank you for :
We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
comments: Really good. But needs more customization options. And full color palette would be nice.
